description: Medications coded with RxNorm SCD, SBD, GPCK, or BPCPK codes
detail: C-CDA medication lists should contain medications coded as RxNorom Semantic Clinical Drugs. This means (for example) products on the level of 'loratadine 10mg oral tablet'.

points.3: > 80% of meds have an RxNorm SCD code
points.2: > 50% of meds have an RxNorm SCD code
points.1: At least one medication has an RxNorm SCD code
points.0: No meds have an RxNorm SCD code
